recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Cook chicken in a pan until done. 3. Mix in pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan cheese. 4. Serve over pasta.
1. Slice beef and coat with cornstarch. 2. Stir fry beef in a pan until browned. 3. Add in broccoli, soy sauce, and rice vinegar. 4. Serve over rice.
1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. 2. Roast vegetables in the oven. 3. Mix vegetables with quinoa and drizzle with olive oil.
1. Sear beef in a pan. 2. Wrap beef with mushrooms and prosciutto in puff pastry. 3. Brush with egg wash. 4. Bake in oven until pastry is golden brown.
1. Cut potatoes into fries and fry until crispy. 2. Dip fish in flour and beer batter. 3. Fry fish until golden brown. 4. Serve with lemon wedges.
1. Boil dates in water until soft. 2. Mix in butter and sugar. 3. Add in eggs and flour. 4. Bake in oven. 5. Serve with vanilla ice cream.
1. Rub chicken with lemon, garlic, and thyme. 2. Roast chicken in oven with butter. 3. Baste chicken every 20 minutes.
1. Toss broccoli with olive oil, garlic, and parmesan cheese. 2. Roast in oven until tender. 3. Drizzle with lemon juice before serving.
1. Cream butter and sugars together. 2. Mix in eggs and vanilla. 3. Add in flour and baking soda. 4. Stir in chocolate chips. 5. Bake in oven.

recipes.recipe_name: Grilled Skirt Steak with Chimichurri Sauce
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Grill steak until desired doneness. 2. Blend parsley, cilantro, garlic, red wine vinegar, and olive oil together to make chimichurri sauce. 3. Serve steak with sauce.
1. Cook grits according to package instructions. 2. Cook bacon in a pan. 3. Add shrimp to the pan and cook until pink. 4. Stir in green onions and heavy cream. 5. Serve over grits.
1. Mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. 2. Whisk in buttermilk, eggs, and melted butter. 3. Cook pancakes on a griddle or pan.
1. Roast eggplant until tender. 2. Blend eggplant with yogurt, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and cumin until smooth.
1. Saute onion, red bell pepper, and garlic. 2. Add in tomatoes, cumin, and paprika. 3. Crack eggs into the pan and cook until set.
1. Mix together chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. 2. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. Melt butter in a pan with garlic and lemon zest. 3. Toss spaghetti with lemon butter and parmesan cheese.
1. Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese. 2. Layer them on a plate with basil leaves. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
1. Mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 2. Whisk in ricotta cheese, lemon zest, lemon juice, and eggs. 3. Cook pancakes on a griddle or pan.
